Review.Titre: Too many dropped calls and poor quality…
Review.Contenu: Too many dropped calls and poor quality sound.I will cancel my subscription a.s.a.p.

Asking for PIN number, even if WITHOUT PIN activated. Number not available, even if not true. While typing the number, "please enter the number you wish to call" .... Some years ago it used to work much better, now it is impossible to use it. I regret having spent these 10 $, they will be the last I have spent on this application
The conversation ends every minut for aprox 10-20 sec ( they cannot hear me or I cannot hear them) and the quality of the call is bad. I don't recommend

Review.Titre: You have taken too much money
Review.Contenu: You have taken too much money, one dollar for some minute talk since you should have taken 1,3 cent per minute. In fact, that was a theft.I wont buy any services from you again. You're just a bunch of thieves.

All the times when I’m in conversation, the conversation is interrupted after few minutes talking, and i have to call back, another couples minutes and its happen again, looks i talking alone on the phone and i have to close conversation and recall. Every single time same problem and i hope this is go t o fix it, never happen. I will not recommend to anyone else this site or app. I will keep with you this month to see if my review is take in consideration and fix the issue, if not, BYE-BYE .

Some of the local access phone numbers provided a very poor connection. There are massive delays in communication, drops in sound quality and a very annoying echo when calling either landlines or cellphones.The advertised 1.2 cents per minute rate applies only to calls made to landlines using the local access phone numbers. The toll free access numbers  surcharge 2c per minute, something that is not disclosed on the page detailing the rates.

Review.Titre: Don't waste your time and money on this
Review.Contenu: Most of the time the App keep calling is offline and I can not place a call. The phone has wifi or cellular all the time but the app doesn't work. I do not recommend. There are many other app or services that are cheaper and really work. I kept this for my father because he is old and he can not transition easy to something new but he will have to because this works only randomly not when you actually need it.

Review.Titre: I have used this app for a while and it…
Review.Contenu: I have used this app for a while and it worked great. Since October 2018 it stopped working- calls don't  go through but I get charged. I contacted KC team and they recommended to reinstall the app. I did, it worked for a couple of times, then it didn't. In the meantime I changed my phone, I have a different version of Android but the newly installed app still doesn't work.

Review.Titre: I would have given you zero
Review.Contenu: I would have given you zero. I've paid last month £3.29 and I've received £1.60 credit to call Romania from England with a delay of few days.You have taken my mony 07/05/2018 this month and I've receivd nothing, £0 credit. Please put my mony back in my account and stop taking my money montly from my account.I kindly ask you to  take my bank account out from your system and stop taking money from my card.Many thanks,Georgeta Tatar

Review.Titre: To be honest I have really bad…
Review.Contenu: To be honest I have really bad experience with that app, always I have problems when I want to call. And I left message for the team to contact me to discuss the problem but no one contacted me yet... anyway this it’s will be my last month paying this bad services.

Disappointed! I referred someone with the same last name as mine after marriage (one of my husband’s relatives, leaves 2000 miles away from where I leave) ... however, I do not receive the credit for referral per customer service because we share the same last name...

Not happy Looking for a different way to call70 percent of the time I try and it doesn’t workThe machine keeps asking me to put my number in over and over again and it is not dialing , ringing on the other side
Lately, IOS doesn't work on SunaRomania. Can't hear anything, the person called can't hear me also. Tried to contact Customer Service...no answer. Sorry, have to look for another provider...

Review.Titre: Because i ended up paying on my Verizon…
Review.Contenu: Because i ended up paying on my Verizon bill for a conversation that was dropped... allegedly
The connectivity is very poor, phone calls get interrupted every single time I place a cal

Review.Titre: The app does not call 80% of the time.

Review.Contenu: I lost my virtual number, even my automatic payment was on and my card was there
Poor quality on reception. Had to re call with different carrier multiple times.

This review reflects the present situationFor the last ~4 months, we have problems with the quality of the connection. We never had this in the past it's new, it's very strange waths happen, the conversation is in mod "playback"  like was recorded. We need to hang and dial again.Many thanksMarian

Review.Titre: Conversations automatically recorded and played back in loop.
Review.Contenu: Unfortunately, the android app used to make calls, "Keep Calling", has big issues. It's frustrating to discover that the conversations are automatically recorded, without our consent. During the call, the normal conversation is interrupted and we can hear the recorded voice of the person we were speaking to played back in loop. Than we are forced to hung-up. My friends have the same issue. So, I'll stop using this app and I think to stop my monthly plan and looking for other carrier.Thank you for asking my opinion!

Review.Titre: Every time I call in Romania
Review.Contenu: Every time I call in Romania, for some reason my phone call is interrupted ! Last week I was interrupted twice! I don’t know what’s going on but I don’t know what to do? Thanks
Always getting disconnected. No matter if is wi-fi from house or phone. My carier is Verizon, never had problems with connection or wi-fi. It’s definitely a problem with this service.

Review.Titre: Caller ID not showing original number
Review.Contenu: Caller ID not showing original number, calls running somewhere, but not at the called number and calls dropping suddenly, echo ....these are just a few reasons for 2 stars

Review.Titre: Over the past week we are experiencing…
Review.Contenu: Over the past week we are experiencing connection issues when calling both cellphones and desk phones.The message we receive on both is: Persoana apelată  nu este disponibilă.

Review.Titre: I have asked for 2 days for a call…
Review.Contenu: I have asked for 2 days for a call back,leaving second request.Instead ,i received and email back. Thanks a lot for your prompt response.
Dropping calls every 5-6 min. ( even our   providing signal is a  full 5 bars).Very anoing. We considering changing this service.
losing audio over 4g internet (solid connection) every 3 minutescan not have a normal phone conversation using their app
I'm using the Android app, Keep Calling. Many times I have to call twice because at the first call my voice is not heard.
Poor mobile connection. Also quits often. Not satisfied yet.

Review.Titre: I supposed for an operator to call me…
Review.Contenu: I supposed for an operator to call me for details

Review.Titre: The quality of calls is no good

Review.Contenu: Calls are not reliable

Overall good but on my last call, I was on hold for many, many hours with the flight company that messed up my trip. When I was finally able to speak with a representative I suddenly hear, “please introduce the number you wish to call”.  I have plenty of minutes because I just charged my number and needless to say I had to wait other more hours to be able to speak with another person. That really upset me. I don’t know why the conversation ended abruptly. No one hung up since I didn’t hear the busy sound, but was advised to reintroduce the number while I was in the middle of the conversation. Otherwise, I am pretty happy with the service.
The calling quality is good, availability same; the only problem is billing; it’s erratic and sometimes it says it can’t charge or it jumps off automatic renewal.
Hello,I have tried to contact you but it was impossible. For me, this is an issue.Please let me know how can I contact you for information.Thanks

Review.Titre: I have been using SunaRomania for a few…
Review.Contenu: I have been using SunaRomania for a few years!Service was excellent when buying minutes!When I switched to monthly plan, I had issues with my internet connection,But even when calling in Offline Mode,I heard noises when the app started.So I am thinking that there is a problem with KeepCalling app of recent make.Overall,I am happy with it!

Review.Titre: I have used SunaRo for years
Review.Contenu: I have used SunaRo for years. In the beginning I world give 5/5. However lately, the numbers don't get dialed, it keeps saying "please enter the number you wish to dial". The account has enough money, but those access numbers sometimes don't work. If that could be fixed, so one access number can be used repeatedly, I world give 5/5 again.

The site should show my available points to redeem BEFORE I posted an order so I could use them instead of new money... the points were revealed right AFTER I paid money! This was misleading and not nice...I should get an Email whenever I reach the number of points available to redeem!

Review.Titre: The services are good and the price is…
Review.Contenu: The services are good and the price is low, however the conversation are interrupted if you go over 50 minutes, and if you change the credit card in the account you are unable to use you services until next pay period, even thought they did the verification with your current credit card

Worked well for years, but iver the past year almost every time we call land lines, a number totally different from the dialed one is called. When calling for assistance I am given every time anither Sunaromania acess # to dial, which solves nothing. When I inform Sunaromania of that, they refuse to return my calls.

Been using this service for several years and overall the service is not outstanding, but just OK. Voice quality is not always very good. I get much better voice when the call originates from Romania.Just yesterday I got disconnected twice, just minutes into the conversation. After the 2nd. time, I gave up and had the other party call me from Romania and got to talk uninterrupted and with much higher voice quality.

Overall I am happy with the service, i am using it for several years by now wihout major issues. Prices are good. What i meam by not major issues is:  in the past 2 months I ovserved that become mire frequent to have the calls cut during conversation at an interval of 2-3 min regardless the remaining credit. When I have a chat girls conversation I dont mind to have my call cut, but as this isnt always the case is becoming frustrating

I use your services specially to call Romania at a very good rate. By phone, dialing a local number, the service is very good. But I could never call from my laptop or tablet , via internet , because the person I call can not hear me even if I hear her very well. I did all the microphone and volume settings but still not working.

I purchased credit recently, it's cheap which is great, but i got charged twice. I contacted them, then contacted paypal which told me i was charged twice by the merchant, so after contacting them again and them asking me to contact paypal, i found myself in a circle from which i cannot escape appearantly. My money is still stuck, paypal ensured me is by the merchant, but they can only open a dispute after 30 days. "Keep calling" says they cannot see that i was charged twice and to give it a few more days... i hope they will fix it.

Review.Titre: calls are fine, but have had issues with sms
Review.Contenu: Had issues with sms messages not being received to my recipient to the stage they asked if I was still talking with them after 3 days and 12 sms being sent and not received by her and was not an isolated issue, and all support said was that it showed they were delivered but a screen shot from her showed different. Called her last night and had 3 calls drop out, generally have confidence in calling, but never know if sms have been sent so I moved to another company for that

I was very excited at the beginning, the price was good connection was acceptable. But for the last few months the connection is really, really bad. I would like you to do something about that otherwise I will end up the payment. Thank you for your understanding.

Review.Titre: Relatively fairly good service but when …
Review.Contenu: Relatively fairly good service but when calling i dont get a dial tone knowing that a call is in progress,i just wait without any sound and after a good 35-40 seconds the person i called answer if available. I would like to hear that calling sound when calling

I use to make calls form my smartphone. Sometimes the connection just drops. I think with a good Internet connection there shouldn't be any connection problems. Overall I am pretty happy with the services. Thank you SunaRomania!
Sometimes calls can’t be connected properly and I need to dial multiple times till I get proper connection Why can’t top up my credit straight from app and need always to use web page ?

Review.Titre: The application works well for 80% of…
Review.Contenu: The application works well for 80% of calls. Sometime I cannot connect ten number or the connection isn’t good.Maybe it is a good idea to introduce other Tarifs (like prepaid, usable in several months).

Review.Titre: Noise on line when using Keep Calling…
Review.Contenu: Noise on line when using Keep Calling from USA  or from Romania.Whwn using SunaRomania from Bucharest you cannot here thr interlocutor from the USA. Repeated complaints remained not answered!!!

Review.Titre: Good voice quality, bad contacts management
Review.Contenu: Good voice quality, however the new iPhone app is a disaster. Can't find/sort contacts that are in the contact list !!!Previous version of the app did work seamlessly; not anymore.
Using SunaRomania since 2007 ,awesome program. 3 stars because lately app is not very reliable,dropped calls almost every time or app connect wit difficulty at wifi.

Review.Titre: Good service when the connection is not…
Review.Contenu: Good service when the connection is not interrupted. Unfortunately, the connection interrupts at times during the call, therefore I can only rate the service at 3 stars.
I have noticed lately, my calls to Romania get suddenly  interrupted after about 10 min of talking time. This occurrence did not happen in the past.

Review.Titre: Crappy website. It's almost 2020 and their website stays in the 90's
Review.Contenu: Their website will not function when you need to reload your card. And if you're trying to access the website during Romanian holidays, forget about it.

Review.Titre: Acceptable but with to many friction
Review.Contenu: Even if you have strong Internet signal you can't have a great conversation.  To many friction and you don't know when you are conected or not
There was a delay on the sound for 4-5 seconds, so I could not quite have a decent conversation. Also there were cracks each 2-3 minutes.

Review.Titre: Difficult to have a call from first…
Review.Contenu: Difficult to have a call from first try. Most of time i have to call several times until connection is good snd we can hear each e

Review.Titre: Spotty sound even though I was sitting…
Review.Contenu: Spotty sound even though I was sitting right next to our wifi router with perfect network.
Sometimes says no internet connection, sometimes I'm losing the sound.
My conversations get cut. I've noticed that I get less minutes for the money.

Review.Titre: You need a customer service phone #
Review.Contenu: You need a customer service phone #, I tried hard to find one, make it public!
The only issue I have is that everyone I talk to hears an echo of themselves.
I ‘d like to have tho option RECHARGE ,handy in KEEPCALLING application...
Anytime when I call, the conversation ends up unexpectedly.

Review.Titre: Reloading minutes is not letting you to…
Review.Contenu: Reloading minutes is not letting you to reload more than $2.
Sometime the quality is bad.Sometimes fair enough.

Review.Titre: Always stops the sound after few …
Review.Contenu: Always stops the sound after few min...not grear

Review.Titre: Good but the service needs updates
Review.Contenu: Good but its always room for improvement
I get billed twice for every text I send !

Review.Titre: Most of the time is not working …
Review.Contenu: Most of the time is not working properly.

Review.Titre: Sometimes the call gets cut off.

Review.Contenu: I would have given more stars but my last experiences with customer service let me down. You can not just give credit for free to make customers forget they had a problem. Solve it! Nobody told me why my Acc wasn't recharging(was on auto recharge) until I was left without credit, while I was traveling and I had to call to find out. Card expired. Ok.., but let me know!!!! Email me... Any kind of notification would have been helped. Ok. I went online, added a new card ad waiting for my auto charge to get going. Noooo working, I called again and they told me I had to buy credit to activate autocharge. Where does it say this when a card expires and you fill in new info for a good card? How do I supose to know? I wish they monitorise better the Acc so we don't have to contact customer service. Is it that hard to email and notify that we have an expired card? They can't see they can't get money from Me anymore??? At least that if not the concern that a customer is left without credit. Was so inconvenient when that happened.... Overall calling service it's ok. Easy to use. Sometimes gets icky but I can contact family easy through this... And application so helpful to use when traveling. If you find wifi you have a phone too.Since they don't let me replay I'll update my review for that replay: I get emails when I get credit. Sunaromania gets in my main inbox. It's on the safe list. I CAN MANAGE my emails just fine!!!! I am a smart romanian!!!  And on top of that when I called the customer service told me that they do not notify expired cards. Expired cards are not your responsibility, she said.  Why would she say that??!!! And your replay is mean!!!! I can manage my accounts good!!! Not my fault of your poor settings. I can't trust autocharge anymore and since then I have a back up calling Acc just in case. Many options nowadays. If you replay "mean" I might not use sunaromania in the future. You should see I have been a customer for sooo long!!!!

Review.Titre: Very good service abs very cheap.
problems to connect with the pin #

Review.Contenu: Very good connectivity Price has not been changed since l joined

Review.Titre: I have used SunaRomania for a long time…
Review.Contenu: I have used SunaRomania for a long time and been pleased with its service overall. However, lately calls are frequently cut off by external noise or music, and often terminated by the provider. I hope SunaRomania will address these issues ASAP.

You should give an earlier notice that we are low on funds. Perhaps at one dollar mark instead of 2 cents. It is annoying to drop in the middle of the conversation. And yes, I am aware about auto refill but I do not like it.  Otherwise quality is very good majority of times.

Review.Titre: Overall it is a pretty good connection
Review.Contenu: Overall it is a pretty good connection, but there are still interruptions and I need to call again. I know it may be the connection from the other end, but regardless I am pleased with your service and if you keep the same price I will stay you r customer, otherwise I'll shop somewhere else. Thank you

Reliable, good sound, meets my calling needs. Not able to renew the credit balance through the app, must go on website, other than that the app is simple  to use, inexpensive and efficient. Good to have when wassup/messenger and other freebies have audio quality problems.
Good service. Sometimes it happens that I no longer hear the person I was talking to and I hear as a recording of what I spoke before with that person.

Review.Titre: There are many cut call during the…
Review.Contenu: There are many cut call during the conversation
I'm content about the app so far, hope I will remain so for long time.

Review.Titre: The app needs some improvement but is pretty good for the buck
Review.Contenu: Sometimes the connection drops out. The sms service is not always working properly and to use the app you still need a internet connection.  Good service but needs some improvements or updates to recent customer demand! As long as you still internet you might as well use other apps which doesn't require a payment!

Review.Titre: The 500 minutes for $5 is not the best…
Review.Contenu: The 500 minutes for $5 is not the best offer on the market anymore.  There is a competitor on the market ( Boss Revolution ) that offers unlimited minutes for $5 /month. I suggest you to reconsider your offer before myself and others reconsider our choices. Other than the price the application runs pretty smooth, is   friendly enough and easy to use!

I have been using SUNAROMANIA services for many years and overall satisfaction is great. It is a pretty reliable service providing acceptable connection quality for a reasonable price. The reason my rating is 4-star instead of five is that sometimes, very rarely though, I cannot make international phone calls at all. Keep up the good work guys so we can keep calling using SUNAROMANIA!

Review.Titre: This should be actually a 4 1/2 stars!
Review.Contenu: This should be actually a 4 1/2 stars, but I was not able to figure out how to do that. I have used SunaRomania for a few years and by far their service, call quality and consistency are the best we have found.I have had a little issue recently with being charged for calls not made, if I waited too long for an answer when placing a call. It was a little difficult to get my point across but I felt like my concern was listened and issue was resolved to my satisfaction.

Review.Titre: Great service, but rounds up to minute
Review.Contenu: We've been using sunaromania calling cards for over 10 years now. I haven't found such low rates anywhere else, hence I would strongly recommend it. The only little problem I have with their service/product is that it rounds up to the nearest minute. So if we talk for 2 minutes and 10 sec, we get charged for 3 minutes. It would be nice if they could round it up to the nearest half a minute.

This company provides a great product - you can always connect (compared to other companies that have busy lines during major holidays and week-ends), the quality of the call is very good, it is convenient to choose your preferred recharge way (automatic or buy credit for any amount), briefly, very convenient and good value service.The only thing is remembering the number to call and your PIN code but I believe there are options without PIN and special numbers. I recommended to all my friends.

Review.Titre: I signed up with SunaRomania about 2-3…
Review.Contenu: I signed up with SunaRomania about 2-3 months ago.  The process was easy, and straight forward. The monthly billing is clear, with no hidden fees. I am very happy so far. I only give it 4 stars because I do not have a long history with them; but so far, so go.

Technically everything works very well but the rates for mobile numbers is too high... more than double than for landlines... why the rates for mobile and landlines are identical within North America? Landlines are disappearing worldwide... that means we keep paying more and more!I still don't understand why mobile calls are more expensive than landline calls... we pay the same here in North America! Generally speaking, Europeans pay less for telecommunications than Americans...A monthly plan does not match my needs... I am not calling Romania every month so much... it would be a waste of money for me...

The service is great, been using you guys since 5 years ago. I didn't research your competition too much to see if your mobile rates vs. them is WOW, however, the down side is that all the calls I make on the mobile phones, either here in US or in Romania appear as "Unknown number". I am sure that you know this already, or other users alert you, but this leads to a lot of my contacts to not actually pick up. Who calls nowadays with a hidden number? So to make this service perfect, have my own number be displayed when I call either a land or a phone line.

Review.Titre: Good service at an affordable price
Review.Contenu: I have been using this service for many years to call Romania mainly. The service offers decent connection quality at an affordable price. Sometimes there are minor glitches but rare in occurence. Thank you SunaRomania!

Review.Titre: Best way to call Romania and other countries
Review.Contenu: I found out about sunaromania.com from a friend about 7-8 years and never used a single calling card to call home since! I rarely have any dropped calls or problems with the connection. Great experience all around. Plus, the fact that my parents can call me anytime on my cell and they pay only a local rate gives me and them great peace of mind that they can always reach me quickly in case of an emergency.  I used them to call other countries in Europe and Africa as well and while the rates are not as good as with Romania, I always have great connection, which is quite impossible to get with calling cards. I definitely recommend sunaromania.com and hope they keep up their good work.
Satisfied with the service, can't say it's the best, maybe some improvements could be done, but overall it's easy to use, fast, sound quality almost perfect and decent prices.
I do everything over the web and it works very well, no issues at all.Unfortunately reception quality is not  very good at the other end. An improvement in this regard is beneficial.
I do like using your service, but it will be nice to drop the prices automatically from time to time so we can talk more with less money. Thank you.
Very good connection!
Generally,  quality of the sound is ok.Sometimes call gets distorted /disconnected. Issue gets resolved by dialing again. Overall is a good deal.
No problem WRT voice calls , SMS though not so great and unreliable. In general a very good service. The one star I removed is due to SMS unreliability.

Review.Titre: I am using SunaRomania from its…
Review.Contenu: I am using SunaRomania from its services beginning.I found it comfortable with a few exceptions when it ends the conversation on its own decision.
Overall pretty good, happy with the service.Sometimes it's too busy to call, but i guess that also happens with most phone carriers.
Good suna in Romania

Review.Titre: 90% of the time calls are clear and the…
Review.Contenu: 90% of the time calls are clear and the price is great.  Sometimes there is an echo to voice but overall I'm glad I use this service.
Almost flawless; some delay in the calls prevents me from giving it 5 stars, although I understand how VoIP works.

Review.Titre: This company helps making phone calls…
Review.Contenu: This company helps making phone calls to Romania and elsewhere in Europe less expensive and more convenient.

Review.Titre: For the most part it works very well…
Review.Contenu: For the most part it works very well and we are happy, but it does drop calls and that can get annoying.
Price could be better. But I have been satisfied so far, using their services for several good years.

Review.Titre: Not a bad service,but like every other…

Good price, decent connection.Still there are moments when the sound breaks.
Good experience, a couple of times the connection was interrupted
Sometimes takes a long time to connect other than that great quality
Lots of options, great product but voice quality is poor sometimes

Great experience, minimal problems, great value. Recommended. Thanks
Reliable and affordable service; mostly great coverage and quality.

Generally, a good to very good phone service.

Pretty good services, prices could be lower.
Very good. I am satisfied with the service.

Review.Contenu: Time to lower your prices, people!

Review.Contenu: The service is good now!Thank you!

Review.Titre: I am happy with SunaRomania,so far.

Review.Contenu: Over all, constantly good sound.

good enough for the money
Great service, good prices.

Great service at unbelievable price. No hidden fees no surcharges. At a time when everything goes up by at least 10% this service remained at the same price with no trade offs . Great trustworthy company !
Conection is good.Price is good I'm happy with this serviceThank youMarcela
Long time (over 10 years), trusted telephone service with low international rates

Review.Titre: The website is straight forward and…
Review.Contenu: The website is straight forward and easy to navigate

I have used this company for well over 10 years to call my elderly mother back in Romania. The linked app is easy to use. The credit can be topped up from the app. Really good system when there is no modern technology available.

Grait ph. companyI am using this ph. company for more than 5 yrs. to keep in touch with my relatives and friends from Romania, Germany, Canada. The communication is clear, no interruptions or delays. The price per min is lower than other ph. companies and have a convenient autopayment (reloads when the balance is less than $5). I highly recommend it.

Hi everyone. My name is George . I am with Suna Romania since the service started. At that time the rates were higher, although competitive. Today's rates are unbeatable. Over the years I had several offers from others. I am happy with the rates, quality of calls. We are in San Francisco Bay Area, northern California.

We appreciate Suna Romania.
